location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Entrance to the Gulf, and Musandim Island’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:170 x 145 mm, on sheet 340 x 200 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Relief shown by hachures and spot heights. Depths shown by soundings.Nautical chart showing the entrance of the Persian Gulf and the Musandam Peninsula with details on hazardous features and tides given.Title inserted in hand below map.
